notes: Game's framerate is very poor (and the same no matter the graphical settings). Changing the audio levels in the settings seems to make no difference to the actual audio levels, and audio is crackly. Unfortunately not playable.

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 460 Graphics (POLARIS11, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-36-generic, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes: After installing Vulkan (terminal -> Vulkaninfo) it started without problems. Had to reduce the graphic quality from high to medium for acceptable Fps. Just the train sound sometimes starts without any reason.
